channel.title: 4.8 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建
channel.description: Recent content in 4.8 系列 on Fsu0413 的原版 Qt 构建

item.title: 4.8.7 的 Windows 版本
item.description: 重要 FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED 备注 ODBC and SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage. All Dynamic builds have -plugin-sql-xxx. 备注 All builds have -openssl-linked. It links to a dynamic OpenSSL 1.0.2 series which redistributed in the package. Dynamic / Shared Builds Windows-MSVC Qt4.8.7-Windows-x86-VS2010-20200104.7z 下载地址： OSDN 链接 SourceForge 链接 构建主机：Windows XP SP3工具链版本：VS2010 SP1备注： Windows-MinGW Qt4.8.7-Windows-x86-MinGW4.9.4-20200104.7z 下载地址： OSDN 链接 SourceForge 链接 构建主机：Windows XP SP3工具链版本：MinGW-w64 v5 w/ GCC 4.

item.title: 4.8.7 的 macOS 版本
item.description: 重要 FINAL VERSION, NO MORE UPDATES EVEN IF REQUESTED, BUILD ENVIRONMENT HAS BEEN DESTRUCTED 备注 SQLite(distributed with Qt) are built in the backage and have -plugin-sql-sqlite 备注 All builds have -openssl-linked. It links to a dynamic OpenSSL 1.0.2 series which redistributed in the package. 备注 This build is done using an old compiler on an old macOS, and is unknown whether it can be run on newer systems. Dynamic / Shared Builds macOS-x86_64 Qt4.
